Adult frog stage: Adult frogs are usually terrestrial or semi-aquatic.

Polyp budding：New polyps bud from stolons, growing tentacles and mouths to form colonies.
Transform from a polyp into a jellyfish.

Adult Sea Star: Surface covered with spines or bumps, colors vary (orange, purple, red, brown, etc.), fully developed predatory ability.

Adult Stage:Emerges with wings and a proboscis.
